title: Calories in Jersey Mike's Subs
meta_description: Discover calories in Jersey Mike's subs for popular options, including macros, sodium, and tweaks for mini or giant sizes to fit your diet.
assumptions: Regular (7-inch) size, standard white bread, average fillings like turkey/provolone with lettuce, tomato, onion, oil/vinegar; no extra cheese or mayo.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by sub type, size, customizations, bread choice, and location; values based on averages. Check Jersey Mike's app or site for exacts.

quick_answer.text: A regular Jersey Mike's sub typically has ~680 kcal, high in protein and sodium.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Choose wheat bread instead of white

faqs.q: How many calories in a regular Jersey Mike's sub?
faqs.a: About 680 kcal for a standard regular sub with typical fillings.

faqs.q: What are the macros for Jersey Mike's subs?
faqs.a: Typically 38 g protein, 72 g carbs, 28 g fat per regular sub.

faqs.q: Are Jersey Mike's subs high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 1850 mg sodium per regular sub due to meats and bread.

faqs.q: Calories in Jersey Mike's giant sub?
faqs.a: A giant (14-inch) is roughly double, ~1360 kcal, depending on fillings.

faqs.q: How to lower calories in Jersey Mike's subs?
faqs.a: Opt for mini size, no cheese, extra veggies, or 'Mike's Way Lite' with less oil.
